```{r setup, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(halfplus7)
```

```{r, include = FALSE}
age1_list <- c(18:100)
age2_list <- c(18:100)

combinations <- expand.grid(age1 = age1_list, age2 = age2_list)

couple_df <- combinations %>%
  mutate(verdict_long = check_couple(age1, age2))

couple_df4 <- couple_df %>%
  mutate(verdict = case_when(
    str_detect(verdict_long, "NOT") ~ "No",
    !str_detect(verdict_long, "NOT") ~ "Yes"
  ))

ggplot(couple_df4, aes(x = age1, y = age2, color = verdict)) +
  geom_point()


```
